title: PBE account messup
body: So I received a PBE account, but i typed in the wrong email and apparently there was a typo in my password and i need help changing them, someone please help!

replies.body:
We can assist you if you write in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our account specialists will be happy to take it from here. :)

Let me know if you encounter issues submitting that ticket.
Thanks for the link! I submitted a ticket and I got a response that asked me to fill out some info, and I replied to it. But, I replied almost 12 hours ago and i haven't recieved a response yet :(
